--- create_function_interval.sql
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION sch1.INTERVAL_FUNC(i INTERVAL) AS (i)
--- AST
&ast.CreateFunction{
  As:        58,
  RparenAs:  63,
  OrReplace: true,
  Name:      &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 27,
        NameEnd: 31,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 45,
        Name:    "INTERVAL_FUNC",
      },
    },
  },
  Params: []*ast.FunctionParam{
    &ast.FunctionParam{
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 46,
        NameEnd: 47,
        Name:    "i",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 48,
        Name:    "INTERVAL",
      },
    },
  },
  Definition: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 62,
    NameEnd: 63,
    Name:    "i",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION sch1.INTERVAL_FUNC (i INTERVAL) AS (i)
